concept.definition: Data Element was not able to be located
Data Element is known to exist (e.g. claim exists for procedure), but was not found
Data Element is was found matching the criteria
Data element was found, but value was not equal to expected value
Data element was a temporal type (e.g. DateTime, Period, Duration) was within range of dateFilter constraint

concept.display: Date is out of specified range
concept.definition: Data element was a temporal type (e.g. DateTime, Period, Duration) was not in range of dateFilter constraint
Data element was a numeric type (e.g. Quantity, Integer, Range, Ratio, SampledData) was within in range of valueFilter constraint

concept.display: Value is out of specified range
concept.definition: Data element was a numeric type (e.g. Quantity, Integer, Range, Ratio, SampledData) was not in range of valueFilter constraint
The count of data elements found was within specified range

concept.display: Count is out of specified range
concept.definition: The count of data elements found was out of specified range
